content: This is the message that the prophet Habakkuk received in a vision.
How long, O , must I call for help?
Must I forever see these evil deeds?
The wicked far outnumber the righteous,
O  my God, my Holy One, you who are eternal—
O , our Rock, you have sent these Babylonians to correct us,
But you are pure and cannot stand the sight of evil.
